sourcing.instructions: Eu: Purchase from a rare earth supplier; Na: Obtain from a chemical supplier; Nb: Buy from a metal supplier; P: Get from a chemical supplier; Sr: Acquire from a rare earth supplier.
steps: Eu: Purchase from a rare earth supplier; Na: Obtain from a chemical supplier; Nb: Buy from a metal supplier; P: Get from a chemical supplier; Sr: Acquire from a rare earth supplier.
1. Measure each ingredient using a precise digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient using a precise digital scale.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2-3 hours).

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the sample from the crucible.
